description: This file defines the NoteAdapter class, a RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a list of Note objects in an Android application UI. It includes an inner interface for handling item click events, manages note data, and binds data to view holders.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for RecyclerView to display a list of Note objects with click handling.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for holding references to the note item views.

methods.name: NoteAdapter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the adapter with a list of notes and a click listener.

methods.name: updateList
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with a new list of notes.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a new NoteViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a Note object to the ViewHolder's views.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of notes in the list.
